column1: The Purple Pig////Everything else was really good - tuna tartare
column2: the octopus with its delightful green beans
column4: and a wonderful ravioletto. Amazing selection of wines including something Croatian with a funky smell which definitely was different. As a seasoned wine drinker
column5: the smell of this wine was weird at first
column6: but with all the amazing food it went down just fine. This is how you discover new things!!
